Fish 'N Stuff

About Fish N' Stuff

Locally owned and operated since 1987, Fish’N Stuff specializes in outfitting anglers from the beginner to the veteran bass tournament angler. If you’ve ever walked inside our store, you know why it is a fisherman’s paradise. Our goal is to help everyone catch more fish . . . no matter what kind of fish you are after. But if you live for safe-light takeoffs and afternoon weigh-ins, our store will make you feel like a kid in a candy store. We pride ourselves on having the best bass-fishing tackle selection in Arkansas, and we constantly update our inventory to include the latest and greatest baits. Come on in, and we will quickly become your favorite Fish’N Store. You can read more on their about page.

About The Project

Mission: Get full inventory on connected from old shopify design into the new theme.

Technologies Used: Shopify CMS, Google Sheets

Links

  • About Shopify
  • About Google Sheets

Video Demo

Summary

My job on this project was to audit the 45k row data sheet of their orignally shopify site, and import products into the new Shopify site with additional tags attached so the products would show up in the correct places on the frontend of the new Shopify theme we were installing for the client. I also established shipping/pricing rules based on weights of products. Finally, I did the SEO redirects and our standard pre-launch checklist for this project.
